definition: 12-Hydroxyjasmonoyl-L-amino acid + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 Oxygen <=> 12-Hydroxy-12-oxojasmonoyl-L-amino acid + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 3 H2O
name: 12-hydroxyjasmonoyl-L-amino acid,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (12-hydroxylating)
